Classes.Name: Minstrel
Classes.Description: *A traveler among travelers, who roams from town to town performing songs or dances. The Minstrel has a wide array of skills that can help the party in a variety of situations*

Classes.Name: Merchant
Classes.Description: *A traveling tradesman who exchanges goods from various locales for gold and jewels. The Merchant has skills that allow them to buy goods cheaply and sell them for a higher price. They are also good at negotiations using conversational skills.*

Classes.Name: Farmer
Classes.Description: *A worker who lives in harmony with the bounty of nature. In order to reap their harvest, they must set their hand to a number of different tasks, giving them practice with a single skill from another class.*

Skills.Name: Knowledge of Tradition
Skills.Description: You can get more information about the things you see and hear.

Skills.Name: Music
Skills.Description: You can get more information about the things you see and hear.

Skills.Name: Animal Owner
Skills.Description: You can keep additional animals without paying their food and water.

Skills.Name: Trader
Skills.Description: You may buy items at a reduced price or sell items at an increased price.

Skills.Name: Animal Tracking
Skills.Description: You can track certain types of monsters and gain +1 damage against a monster you have tracked.

Skills.Name: Trapping
Skills.Description: Harvest materials from a defeated monster.

Skills.Name: Hunting
Skills.Description: Hunt in the evening instead of participating in the Camp check, gaining rations if successful.

Skills.Name: Healing
Skills.Description: Spend 1 healing herb and 1 day's water rations to restore HP to another character.

Skills.Name: First Aid
Skills.Description: Relieve a status effect for 1 hour.

Skills.Name: Herb Gathering
Skills.Description: Gather herbs in the wilderness, gaining a healing herb for the current terrain if successful.

Skills.Name: Robust
Skills.Description: +1 to Condition checks. +3 to Carrying Capacity

Skills.Name: Side-Job
Skills.Description: Use a single skill from another class with a -1 penalty.

Skills.Name: Crafting
Skills.Description: Make an item from one of your specializations.

Skills.Name: Repair
Skills.Description: Repair an item, returning it to full durability.

Weapons.Name: Blade
Weapons.Description: A weapon with good balance between accuracy and damage. 1-handed.

Weapons.Name: Axe
Weapons.Description: A weapon with poor accuracy, but which takes advantage of the bearer's strength.

Weapons.Name: Bow
Weapons.Description: Can attack from long range, but has poor accuracy. 2-handed.

Weapons.Name: Unarmed
Weapons.Description: +1 to damage if using an improvised weapon.
Weapons.Examples: unarmed combat, using a stick, etc.
